description:
11.100 format
Convert the input video to one of the specified pixel formats.
Libavfilter will try to pick one that is suitable as input to
the next filter.

It accepts the following parameters:

pix_fmts.description: A '|' separated list of pixel format names

name: format

parameters.description: A ’|’-separated list of pixel format names, such as "pix_fmts=yuv420p|monow|rgb24".
parameters.name: pix_fmts

source:
11.100 format

Convert the input video to one of the specified pixel formats. Libavfilter will try to pick one that is suitable as input to the next filter.

It accepts the following parameters:

pix_fmts

A ’|’-separated list of pixel format names, such as "pix_fmts=yuv420p|monow|rgb24".
